mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROGRAM_SCHEDULE ( PS_NO, PS_NAME, PS_START, PS_END, PS_INFO, REG_DATE, REG_ID, MOD_DATE,PS_DAYSOFWEEK,PS_CATEGORY) VALUES ( PS_NO_SEQUENCE.nextval, #{PS_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{PS_START},'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN'), TO_DATE(#{PS_END},'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN'), #{PS_INFO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{REG_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{PS_DAYSOFWEEK, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PS_CATEGORY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT PS_NO,--CRUD를 하는 PK키로 넣기 PS_NAME, TO_CHAR(PS_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS PS_START, TO_CHAR(PS_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS PS_END, PS_INFO, PS_CATEGORY, REG_ID, TO_CHAR(MOD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS MOD_DATE, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DATE, --종류별로 컬러를 넣고 싶은 것으로 아래 case문 작성(색상 취향에 따라 선택) CASE --연보라/연핑크/연민트/기본 : 연초록 '신체', '교양', '문화', '교육', '여가' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '교육' THEN 'lightgreen' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '문화' THEN 'yellow' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '신체' THEN 'lightblue' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '교양' THEN 'lightgrey' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '여가' THEN 'lightorange' ELSE '#6495ED' --#FFFFCC / #6495ED / #F0F8FF END AS COLOR /* CASE --연보라/연핑크/연민트/기본 : 연초록 '신체', '교양', '문화', '교육', '여가' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '교육' THEN '#E0FFFF' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '문화' THEN '#E6E6FA' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '신체' THEN '#FFF0F5' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '교양' THEN '#FFFFCC' WHEN PS_CATEGORY = '여가' THEN '#6495ED' ELSE '#6495ED' --#FFFFCC / #6495ED / #F0F8FF END AS COLOR*/ FROM PROGRAM_SCHEDULE
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PROGRAM_SCHEDULE (PS_NO, PS_START, PS_END, PS_NAME, PS_DAYSOFWEEK, PG_NO, PS_CATEGORY, PS_INFO, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE,MOD_ID) SELECT PS_NO_SEQUENCE.nextval, (PG_START + (LEVEL - 1)* CASE WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '하루' THEN 1 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '매주' THEN 7 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '격주' THEN 14 ELSE 7 END ) AS PS_START, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((PG_START + (LEVEL - 1) * CASE WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '하루' THEN 1 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '매주' THEN 7 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '격주' THEN 14 ELSE 7 END ), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || TO_CHAR(PG_END, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PS_END, PG_NAME AS PS_NAME, PG_DAYSOFWEEK AS PS_DAYSOFWEEK, #{pg_no} AS PG_NO, PG_CATEGORY AS PS_CATEGORY, PG_CONTENT AS PS_INFO, #{REG_ID}, SYSDATE AS REG_DATE, SYSDATE AS MOD_DATE, #{MOD_ID} FROM PROGRAM CONNECT BY PRIOR PG_NO = PG_NO AND PRIOR DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE IS NOT NULL AND LEVEL <= (PG_END - PG_START + 1) / CASE WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '하루' THEN 1 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '매주' THEN 7 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '격주' THEN 14 ELSE 7 END
START WITH PG_NO = #{pg_no}

INSERT INTO PROGRAM_SCHEDULE (PS_NO, PS_START, PS_END, PS_NAME, PS_DAYSOFWEEK, PG_NO, PS_CATEGORY, PS_INFO, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE,MOD_ID) SELECT PS_NO_SEQUENCE.nextval, (PG_START + (LEVEL - 1)* CASE WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '하루' THEN 1 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '매주' THEN 7 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '격주' THEN 14 ELSE 7 END ) AS PS_START, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR( (PG_START + (LEVEL - 1)* CASE WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '하루' THEN 1 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '매주' THEN 7 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '격주' THEN 14 ELSE 7 END ), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || TO_CHAR(PG_END, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PS_END, PG_NAME AS PS_NAME, PG_DAYSOFWEEK AS PS_DAYSOFWEEK, #{pg_no} AS PG_NO, PG_CATEGORY AS PS_CATEGORY, PG_CONTENT AS PS_INFO, #{REG_ID}, SYSDATE AS REG_DATE, SYSDATE AS MOD_DATE, #{MOD_ID} FROM PROGRAM CONNECT BY PRIOR PG_NO = PG_NO AND PRIOR DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE IS NOT NULL AND LEVEL <= (PG_END - PG_START + 1) / CASE WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '하루' THEN 1 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '매주' THEN 7 WHEN PG_REPEAT_TYPE = '격주' THEN 14 ELSE 7 END
START WITH PG_NO = #{pg_no}
